attributes.action: Central and new Goverment Office for all home nations
attributes.additional_details: Create a centra and new government office were the English PM, Scotland First minister, Wales First minister and Northern Ireland First minister meet separate to Westminster and on neutral ground E,g (A new building in Liverpool, almost central to all of the home nations) four times a year. This could promote more unity and corporation among the home nations and show the Public that we are not divided as most believe and reduce the feeling of of inequality in our nation.
